# server.LogRecordSocketReceiver { #dareplane_utils.logging.server.LogRecordSocketReceiver }

```python
logging.server.LogRecordSocketReceiver(
    self,
    host='localhost',
    port=logging.handlers.DEFAULT_TCP_LOGGING_PORT,
    handler=LogRecordStreamHandler,
    logfile=Path('default_socket.log'),
)
```

Simple TCP socket-based logging receiver suitable for testing.
